00013 #ifndef VL_KDTREE_H
00014 #define VL_KDTREE_H
00015 
00016 #include "generic.h"
00017 
00018 #define VL_KDTREE_SPLIT_HEALP_SIZE 5
00019 
00020 typedef struct _VlKDTreeNode VlKDTreeNode ;
00021 typedef struct _VlKDTreeSplitDimension VlKDTreeSplitDimension ;
00022 typedef struct _VlKDTreeDataIndexEntry VlKDTreeDataIndexEntry ;
00023 typedef struct _VlKDForestSearchState VlKDForestSearchState ;
00024 
00025 struct _VlKDTreeNode
00026 {
00027   int unsigned parent ;
00028   int lowerChild ;
00029   int upperChild ;
00030   int unsigned splitDimension ;
00031   float splitThreshold ;
00032   float lowerBound ;
00033   float upperBound ;
00034 } ;
00035 
00036 struct _VlKDTreeSplitDimension
00037 {
00038   int unsigned dimension ;
00039   float mean ;
00040   float variance ;
00041 } ;
00042 
00043 struct _VlKDTreeDataIndexEntry
00044 {
00045   int index ;
00046   float value ;
00047 } ;
00048 
00050 typedef enum _VlKDTreeThresholdingMethod
00051 {
00052   VL_KDTREE_MEDIAN,
00053   VL_KDTREE_MEAN
00054 } VlKDTreeThresholdingMethod ;
00055 
00057 typedef struct _VlKDForestNeighbor {
00058   float distance ;     
00059   unsigned int index ; 
00060 } VlKDForestNeighbor ;
00061 
00062 typedef struct _VlKDTree
00063 {
00064   VlKDTreeNode * nodes ;
00065   int unsigned numUsedNodes ;
00066   int unsigned numAllocatedNodes ;
00067   VlKDTreeDataIndexEntry * dataIndex ;
00068   int depth ;
00069 } VlKDTree ;
00070 
00071 struct _VlKDForestSearchState
00072 {
00073   VlKDTree * tree ;
00074   unsigned int nodeIndex ;
00075   float distanceLowerBound ;
00076 } ;
00077 
00079 typedef struct _VlKDForest
00080 {
00081   int numDimensions ;
00082 
00083   /* indexed data */
00084   float const * data ;
00085   int numData ;
00086 
00087   /* tree structure */
00088   VlKDTree ** trees ;
00089   unsigned int numTrees ;
00090 
00091   /* build */
00092   VlKDTreeThresholdingMethod thresholdingMethod ;
00093   VlKDTreeSplitDimension splitHeapArray [VL_KDTREE_SPLIT_HEALP_SIZE] ;
00094   int unsigned splitHeapNumNodes ;
00095   int unsigned splitHeapSize ;
00096 
00097   /* querying */
00098   VlKDForestSearchState * searchHeapArray ;
00099   int unsigned searchHeapNumNodes ;
00100   int unsigned searchId ;
00101   int unsigned * searchIdBook ;
00102 
00103   int unsigned searchMaxNumComparisons ;
00104   int unsigned searchNumComparisons;
00105   int unsigned searchNumRecursions ;
00106   int unsigned searchNumSimplifications ;
00107 } VlKDForest ;
00108 
00111 VL_EXPORT VlKDForest * vl_kdforest_new (int unsigned numDimensions, int unsigned numTrees) ;
00112 VL_EXPORT void vl_kdforest_delete (VlKDForest * self) ;
00118 VL_EXPORT void vl_kdforest_build (VlKDForest * self, int numData, float const * data) ;
00119 VL_EXPORT int vl_kdforest_query (VlKDForest * self,
00120                                  VlKDForestNeighbor * neighbors,
00121                                  int unsigned numNeighbors,
00122                                  float const * query) ;
00127 VL_INLINE int unsigned vl_kdforest_get_depth_of_tree (VlKDForest const * self, int unsigned treeIndex) ;
00128 VL_INLINE int unsigned vl_kdforest_get_num_nodes_of_tree (VlKDForest const * self, int unsigned treeIndex) ;
00129 VL_INLINE int unsigned vl_kdforest_get_num_trees (VlKDForest const * self) ;
00130 VL_INLINE void vl_kdforest_set_max_num_comparisons (VlKDForest * self, int unsigned n) ;
00131 VL_INLINE int unsigned vl_kdforest_get_max_num_comparisons (VlKDForest * self) ;

00133 VL_INLINE VlKDTreeThresholdingMethod vl_kdforest_get_thresholding_method (VlKDForest const * self) ;
00143 int unsigned
00144 vl_kdforest_get_num_nodes_of_tree (VlKDForest const * self, int unsigned treeIndex)
00145 {
00146   assert (treeIndex < self->numTrees) ;
00147   return self->trees[treeIndex]->numUsedNodes ;
00148 }
00149 
00157 int unsigned
00158 vl_kdforest_get_depth_of_tree (VlKDForest const * self, int unsigned treeIndex)
00159 {
00160   assert (treeIndex < self->numTrees) ;
00161   return self->trees[treeIndex]->depth ;
00162 }
00163 
00171 int unsigned
00172 vl_kdforest_get_num_trees (VlKDForest const * self)
00173 {
00174   return self->numTrees ;
00175 }
00176 
00189 void
00190 vl_kdforest_set_max_num_comparisons (VlKDForest * self, int unsigned n)
00191 {
00192   self->searchMaxNumComparisons = n ;
00193 }
00194 
00204 int unsigned
00205 vl_kdforest_get_max_num_comparisons (VlKDForest * self)
00206 {
00207   return self->searchMaxNumComparisons ;
00208 }
00209 
00218 VL_INLINE void
00219 vl_kdforest_set_thresholding_method (VlKDForest * self, VlKDTreeThresholdingMethod method)
00220 {
00221   assert(VL_KDTREE_MEDIAN <= method && method <= VL_KDTREE_MEAN) ;
00222   self->thresholdingMethod = method ;
00223 }
00224 
00234 VL_INLINE VlKDTreeThresholdingMethod
00235 vl_kdforest_get_thresholding_method (VlKDForest const * self)
00236 {
00237   return self->thresholdingMethod ;
00238 }
